channel.title: Hacker News on Jian
channel.description: Recent content in Hacker News on Jian

item.title: Hacker News Word Cloud
item.description: The word cloud generated here is based on the website hacker news. The reason this post is; is so that it would easier to see the word that appeared the most for the day. Even though the use of a word cloud is not exactly a good representation of occurrence, it still looks nice. Please note that the posts here are generated based on the Hacker News API by doing GET requests.
